description:
I stumbled across this program a few years ago whilst searching for the perfect GTK theme. I couldn't quite find a theme that suited me, and wanted to create one myself but found even getting into writing my own GTK theme to be wayyyy to difficult.
Oomox gives you a template and a graphical interface to easily create your own GTK, Window and Icon themes. It's the perfect program for when you can quite find the right theme for you. Would highly recommend!

This app has a lot of Theme Templates. I mean *a lot*. You can customize their colors and only a few other things. You cannot make a new unique theme. I'd be happy if they added more options for components that are not related to color.
summary: Good App but only for customizing colors of existing themes

description: Great workaround for GTK's theming shortcomings. Some things should just be an option in default gnome like selecting the accent color
This is a great app for newbie users who wants to customize their ui, but very buggy and no support for gtk4. = ?
